plugins.name: ucrm-client-signup
plugins.description: A UCRM plugin that provides a frontend form for clients to signup.
plugins.author: Charuwts, LLC

plugins.name: kmz-map
plugins.description: A UCRM plugin that provides a frontend Google Map for clients to view tower coverage.
plugins.author: Charuwts, LLC

plugins.name: quickbooks-online
plugins.description: This plugin exports payments and invoices to QuickBooks Online
plugins.author: Ubiquiti Networks, Inc.

plugins.name: mkt-queue-sync
plugins.description: Plugin para sincronizar simple queues con los limites de velocidad establecidos en Ucrm - Very basic plugin based on a Ubiquiti plugin, to synchronize Ucrm Services with Miktotik Simple Queue https://wiki.mikrotik.com/wiki/Manual:Queue
plugins.author: Franco Johan Gampel - franco@gampel.com.ar

plugins.name: sms-twilio
plugins.description: This plugin sends SMS notifications via Twilio. NOTE: only phone numbers in the international format can be used, e.g. +155 555 1234
plugins.author: Ubiquiti Networks, Inc.

plugins.name: fio_cz
plugins.description: This plugin enables you to import payments from Fio bank to UCRM. See https://www.fio.cz/bankovni-sluzby/api-bankovnictvi
plugins.author: Ubiquiti Networks, Inc.
